meanings.sent1: The encysted parasite was safely protected within its cyst.
meanings.sent2: The doctor discovered an encysted tumor during the examination.
meanings.sent3: The encysted pearl was carefully hidden within the oyster.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were encysted, shielded from the outside world.
meanings.sent5: The encysted seed remained dormant until the right conditions emerged.

meanings.definition: To enclose or become enclosed in a cyst.
meanings.sent1: The surgeon had to encyst the abscess to prevent further infection.
meanings.sent2: Over time, the wound began to encyst, forming a protective barrier.
meanings.sent3: She decided to encyst her precious jewelry in a hidden compartment.
meanings.sent4: The spider encysted its prey in silk before consuming it.
meanings.sent5: The caterpillar encysted itself in a cocoon, preparing for transformation.
